Package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.geometric

Class CircleFitGeometricDist

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.geometric.CircleFitGeometric
      • imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.geometric.CircleFitGeometricDist
  • public class CircleFitGeometricDist
extends CircleFitGeometric
    "Distance-based" geometric circle fitter using a Levenberg-Marquart optimizer.
